mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff(staffNum, staffName, birth, department,tel,staffImage) VALUES (staff_seq.NEXTVAL, #{staffName},#{birth},#{department},#{tel}, #{staffImage})
mapper.update: UPDATE staff SET staffName=#{staffName}, birth=#{birth}, department=#{department}, tel=#{tel}, staffImage=#{staffImage}
mapper.select: SELECT staffNum, staffName, to_char(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, department, tel, staffImage FROM staff WHERE staffNum=#{staffNum};
